data.message: I have so many follower please verified my account

replies.message: Hey Shihab. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2jo7nVc. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. Information for this badge can be found in the Help Center here: http://bit.ly/2iSnneu. -Tenaya
